useCase.name: ManageCompanyStructure
useCase.description: Allows a user to create and manage a company structure with departments and employees.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has necessary permissions.

useCase.trigger: User initiates the operation to manage a company structure.

mainSequence.step: User launches the application and selects the option to manage the company structure.
The system invokes the main() function to begin.
The main function triggers the runDepartments() method.
A new DepartmentComposite named "Company" is created.
A new DepartmentComposite named "HR" is created.
A new EmployeeLeaf with ID 1000 is created and assigned to HR.
A new EmployeeLeaf with ID 1000 is created and assigned to HR.
System outputs "Company workers: 6" by calling the countOfWorkers() method of Company.
